thread.title: Mark Zuckerberg’s sister Arielle joins Kleiner Perkins
thread.title_full: Mark Zuckerberg’s sister Arielle joins Kleiner Perkins - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Wendy Lee
title: Mark Zuckerberg’s sister Arielle joins Kleiner Perkins
text:
Arielle Zuckerberg, an angel investor, tech product manager and sister of Facebook founder Mark Zuckerberg, will be joining venture capital firm Kleiner Perkins as an associate partner. Arielle Zuckerberg, an angel investor, tech product manager and...
Kleiner Perkins Caufield and Byers announced Tuesday that Arielle Zuckerberg, an angel investor, tech product manager and sister of Facebook founder Mark Zuckerberg, will be joining the venture firm. Arielle Zuckerberg, an angel investor, tech product manager and sister of Facebook founder Mark Zuckerberg, will be joining venture capital firm Kleiner Perkins as an associate partner. Kleiner Perkins Caufield and Byers announced Tuesday that Arielle Zuckerberg, an angel investor, tech product manager and sister of Facebook founder Mark Zuckerberg, will be joining the venture firm.
